page.title: 02THE BROCHS
page.content:
The first people may have lived in the area almost 4000years ago. They left behind{brochs,}three can be clearly seen - 2 to the north of the harbour and 1 beside the A9 100m. north of the village.
A broch was a circular wall 5m.thick & about 12m. high,with a low archway through the wall for an easily defended entrance leading to a courtyard in the centre.
The Keiss brochs are clearly visible,one of the ones on the shore showing signs that it had been enlarged at one stage. At first it was thought that the brochs were places people ran to for protection, but now it is thought that people lived in the brochs all the time.
